content.description: This is sharp... like the "Stained Glass" of Black Mtn. Start with two razor blades overhead and let them sink into you fingers with all of your body weight, then them sink deeper still as you lurch for the mocking smile above you. Connect a few more move between heinous edges and then top out with care high off the deck. You special breeds of masochists that claim to "like" crimpy lines will indeed feel the sweet pain.

Slightly overhanging, very intimidating and awesome highball. The physical crux is near the top where it is some-what safe to take a fall onto a pad, but right after you pull it you have to commit to the mental crux where you pull up to the top.   I believe it gets shade all day.
content.location: From Largo Stem go directly downhill, down the wash/trail, for about 100 yards or more. The trail should lead to it, it should be on the left of the trail. It is the obvious Hueco and featured black and orange rock.
